title: Decouple dev genesis file for Privacy

labels.name: TeamRevenant
labels.description: GH issues worked on by Revenant Team

body:
### Context 
Currently testing features for mainnet and privacy both require to use the same dev genesis file and the hash is hard-coded which makes it difficult to modify the dev genesis file. 

Previous attempt to do this can be found here: #3121
An alternative approach is to have a separate dev genesis file for mainnet tests and privacy tests. 

### Desired Outcome 
We can make updates to the dev genesis file without breaking the privacy tests
